title: Small bug
body: https://youtu.be/m1YfBVlP4hU

title: Fix formatting in en_locale arrays
body: Signed-off-by: Lesya Novaselskaya <shams@airpost.net>

title: Fix ru_locale strings and arrays
body:
1) Fix incorrect, awkward and machine-translated strings

2) Regroup strings (they were ordered alphabetically;  it was pretty
confusing: related values, originally grouped by type ['settings_'
or 'action_' etc.) were scattered all around the xml) to fit the
original EN XML file

3) Fix missing, incorrect, awkward and machined-translated arrays

4) Add missing strings (it seems that many strings were added in
EN locale, but were missing in Russian one) and arrays

5) Perhaps it was not worth translating commented out <explore-items>
portion. I thought it was probably tagging work in progress, so if
it's not needed, I can remove it.

Signed-off-by: Lesya Novaselskaya <shams@airpost.net>

title: Fix typos in german translation
body: Signed-off-by: mueller-ma <mueller-ma@users.noreply.github.com>

title: FR: Include metadata for fdroid
body:
When providing metadata via a fastlane directory, fdroid automaticly shows them in the store. You dont need to install fastlane, just create the folder

Example: https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android/en-US
Info: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots

title: Cannot load trending
body:
The F-Droid version cannot load anything, as the "trending" area always shows nothing. "Nothing loaded. Press to retry".

For some strange reason I can download images and set them as backgrounds.
It shows a strange loading animation then, but that's it.

title: Some SSL error
body:
Hi, I'm using v3.2.1 from F-Droid and getting a notification on the bottom of the screen saying:

`Failed to load.
(javax.net.ssl.SSLProtocolException: SSL... hand)`

It's cut off at the ... point and I can't seem to expand it. I'm on Android 4.4.4 by the way.

title: Error:(158, 57) error: cannot find symbol method setSearchPhotoList(List<Photo>)
body:
Error:(158, 57) error: cannot find symbol method setSearchPhotoList(List<Photo>)
Error:(171, 106) error: cannot find symbol method getSearchPhotoList()7

Error:(53, 19) error: cannot find symbol variable activity_tag_statusBar

and many errors. How to fix it?

title: Add To Collection size
body:
Hello,

Is there a possibility that the popup to add a photo to a collection, could be a bit bigger? I can see just 2 actual collections, and having the popup a bit bigger would allow more to be visible.

Otherwise, amazing app! Love using it, feels really smooth and just simple.

title: Adjustments to the french translation and new strings for Muzei
Automatic download of pictures in certain collections
body:
This is a feature request.

I think it would be really useful if there was an option to automatically download pictures in a certain collection, when one adds a new one.

Similar to what Spotify Premium offers with playlists.

I don't know if that would be possible, but it would be really great to have. Thanks

title: Added Muzei support
body: Hi @WangDaYeeeeee , I just added [Muzei live-wallpaper](http://muzei.co/) support for this app. Once Mysplash installed, there will be a new Muzei art sources. It's now using curated photos by default, you may add more options in future.

title: Would you move the art things to an issue or anywhere else?
body:
Really nice project!!

But there is quite a little bit of images making it hard to clone, would you like to move it to an issue? thx!

title: Where is the newest version in Relative Images and "more" section?
body:
Where is the newest version in Relative Images and "more button" section?

Thanks.

title: japanese translation
body: Hello!

title: v3.0.8 source code not published?
body: There is v3.0.8 on Google Play. In this repo there is only v3.0.7 (see `app/build.gradle`), though tagged as v3.0.8. Could you please clarify my confusion? I'd like to bring the latest version of Mysplash to F-Droid.

title: Login fails (with other browser)
body:
Using Firefox for Android v52 and Mysplash 3.0.5 I cannot login. When I login into my MySplash account I am redirected to the app, but the app does not recognize it and still says I am not logged in.

Maybe you could rather use built-in WebView like [StreetComplete](https://github.com/westnordost/StreetComplete/) does it, which may be more robust for this login. However, this of course has the disadvantage that users cannot use the browser's password manager for logging in.

body: When I click more button always 0 relative photos. Please fix them.

title: Crash when viewing image
body:
After an update to the latest version, I encounter an App crash when I click on an image to view its details.

App Version: 2.9.3
Android OS: 7.1/LineageOS 14.1
Reproducibility: always
STR: Tap an image in the stream.

From my logcat, I can see this NPE:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to read from field 'java.util.List com.wangdaye.mysplash._common.data.entity.unsplash.Photo$RelatedPhotos.results' on a null object reference
	at com.wangdaye.mysplash._common.ui.adapter.PhotoInfoAdapter.buildTypeList(PhotoInfoAdapter.java:125)
```

Some more context (stripped down a little bit):
```
02-22 08:45:59.053 I/ActivityManager( 3109): Start proc 20506:com.wangdaye.mysplash/u0a389 for activity com.wangdaye.mysplash/.main.view.activity.MainActivity
```

title: Where is the new Version 3?
body: Please add new build?

title: [Idea] Live Photos
body: If user select a category, will soon live wallpaper on schedule? Is this possible? Maybe could this function very impreessive.

title: [idea] show remaining API requests
body:
Would it be possible to show the remaining API requests for this hour somewhere in the app (for instance inside the left panel)? as far as I understand their documentation you always receive something like
```
200 OK
X-Ratelimit-Limit: 1000
X-Ratelimit-Remaining: 999
```
as part of their HTTP Response header.
At this point when you know the global limit it would also be possible to just count the requests locally, right? I think this might be a good way to handle the current situation with the rate limiting.

title: Load nothing
body: Hi. Version 2.8.9 doesn't load any image.

title: Profile header stays fixed
body: Header (with photo,name and description of a person) sometimes stays fixed. I'm able to see pictures and scroll down with the header expanded.

title: v2.8.8 can't like pictures anymore
body: the latest update which "improves some of the logic behind liking pictures" actually broke it for me. the tiny spinner comes up for a second but the picture remains without a like. Have tried it with both official and custom API keys. Can you please check if everything is technically fine?

title: Load Nothing Again
body: In morning load nothing again...

title: Update README.md
body: Add buttons to get the app from google play and f-droid

title: Tag Search
body: if user click tags then show tag's images? Is this possible? like http://www.arthurweill.fr/Unsplash/en maybe you can add your project :)

title: Dont looks good category section
body: I dont like new category section maybe you can add √¢ bottombar like 500px get better. Is this possible?

title: Error on sliding down
body: In new tab when I scrollling down always it crashed. Check it out app.

title: Suggestion: Using Github releases to host apks
body: As we have more and more releases, the repo size grows fast. I suggest to use Github releases to host packages and remove them from git trees.

title: [feature request] follow users
body: I am not sure if this feature is still in beta, but recently Unsplash introduced a new feature to their page that finally lets you follow specific photographers (just like you would on other social networks). Would be cool if this functionality could come to Mysplash as well.

title: Can't load anything
body: Since the 2.7.3 > 2.7.8 update in F-Droid.

title: Custom APIKEY?
body: Add an option to allow user to set their own APIKEY to prevent rate limit.

title: Prevent downloading duplicate pictures
body: It is currently possible to download as many duplicates of a picture as one wants.

title: Automatically set image as background
body:
It would be nice if this app would have an option to automatically download a good, recent image (maybe features or so) and set it as the Android home screen background image once a day.

This way we can always enjoy a nice "picture of the day".

title: download issues
body: About picture download issues,it's not to download.

title: Possible copyright infringement
body:
Hi

I really like it, is super cool app, well designed, with good performance, etc.

I don't know what's the license of this project.  But it seems like someone just forked and created an almost-exact (if not exact) copy of your app.

Just wanted to let you know in case you want to report it or do something about it.

Good luck and keep up the awesome work.

Link to the app:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brocoli.wally
